2132.subject: BUS
2132.descrlong: Develops empathetic listening, speaking, reading, and writing abilities through the introduction of communication in a business and societal context. Rhetorical concepts help students to frame and integrate reading, writing, and speaking abilities to enhance their comprehension, interpretation, and expression. (Offered every semester.)
